body:
A while ago i posted a post about your computer specs now i thought why not see what everyone else s gaming set up looks like!
-This is just something i thought would be cool!

Here is Mine And ElementProHD's Set up! Yes only laptops :D
-
 -
Here is another from below!
-
-
Yes we do have CCTV of our whole house in our little lair! :D
